entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The MaximumVisible property in the IndicatorView is not working correctly #28036
    Backlog
  • Screen Reader Not Skipping Hamburger Menu Button on Flyout Page #28034
  • CollectionView2 Layout Misalignment in GridItemsLayout with Horizontal Orientation on iOS and Catalyst #28030
  • [Testing] Unable to Select Individual Picker Items in iOS and Catalyst Using Appium #28024
    Backlog
  • I2 - Entering the vertical and horizontal lists again, Monkeys still retain the spacing value changed last time #28023
  • [Testing] EmptyView(null ItemsSource) elements Not Accessible via Automation on Windows Platform #28022
    Backlog

Closed

  • CollectionView with grouped data crashes on iOS when the groups change. #27797
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Shell flyout throws an exception on Android if there's a FragmentLifecycle.Callback #27889
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Rectangle layout issue in a Grid #13126
  • [MacCatalyst] BoxView CornerRadius property is not working #10480
  • MAUI Android Flyout Menu: Opening the Flyout Menu programmatically does not work correctly. #13233
  • visual studio 2022 Maui .net 9 build issues #27759
  • Create a PickerCell to be used with a TableView #5920
    Backlog
  • [Enhancement] CalendarView #5486
    Backlog
  • UseInterpreter for cpecific library only? #28032
  • In the project properties, the Custom Entitlements is missing .NET MAUI #22299
    Backlog
  • API mediapicker to take photo without user tap on take photo button #22723
    Backlog
  • CS0117: 'Resource' does not contain a definition for #22796
    Backlog
  • Add a `TabView` control #23028
    Backlog
  • When executing the ‘dotnet tool restore’ command on MAUI repository on mac, it prompts that the command could not be load #24535
    Backlog
  • *.appinstaller - outdated schema #23583
    Backlog
  • .Net Maui CheckBox enabled color is not updated properly. #23608
    Backlog
  • The header in a collectionview does not resize if you hide the content #28012
    Backlog
  • [iOS/Mac] CollectionView is not shown when parent IsVisible is switched to true #23573
    Backlog
  • IsVisible false is not propagated to child controls #19139
    Backlog
  • fatal Exception: System.ArgumentNullException #24402
    Backlog
  • Support for Sending POS Commands via Bluetooth in ESC-POS.NET #24654
    Backlog
  • In Iphone13 (ios 15.0) version button click events not working fine in iphone 16 working fine #25244
    Backlog
  • SwipeView causes Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot add a null child view to a ViewGroup #26328
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Enhancement, Epic] Improve debug experience #27016
    Backlog
  • Reenable disabled flaky UI tests #27272
    Backlog
  • UITests broken for net9 #23064
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Cannot deploy app in debug using hot restart (skiasharp issue) #28026

PullRequests

Created

  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10.0 #28044
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [code style] Prefer file-scope namespaces #28040
    community ✨
  • [Android] Refactor: Remove Obsolete API Usage & Fix Warnings in FilePicker and FileSystemUtils #28038
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 18 #28033
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Mark MapReload from PickerHandler Obsolete #28028
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update default value for LineHeight in the ToNSAttributedString method #28027
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Testing] Implement the option to change system theme on Appium #28025
    area-testing

Merged

  • remove Dispose call on ShellItemRenderer #27890
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Fix flaky UITests 7 #28000
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for Slider Control #27433
    area-testing, community ✨, area-controls-slider, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] CollectionView with grouped data crashes on iOS when the groups change - fix #27991
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR5
  • [ci] Last move sequoia #28029
    do-not-merge
  • [android] move `IsDispatchRequiredImplementation()` to Java #27936
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 11 #27764
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [ci] Update autoformat prs version #28042
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 9 SR5
  • [ci] Remove usage on cake script #28037
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 9 SR5
  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md to clarify .NET SDK version needed #28031
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed CheckBox enabled color is not updated properly #26399
    community ✨, area-controls-checkbox, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-general, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Fix crash starting the swipe on SwipeView inside CollectionView #27669
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-swipeview, .NET 9 SR5
  • [ci] Publish workload VS insertion zips #28016
    area-infrastructure
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28021
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail. #27453
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 3 #27905
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5

Updated

  • [iOS] Make sure the Window is available #28013
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-window, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR5
  • add DebuggerTypeProxy for Shell #27989
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Fixes #22914 #22917
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • Fixed Button rendering overflow in StackLayout #28001
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 16 #27968
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [net10.0] Enable trimmer warnings #28015
    t/app-size, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Android] MediaPicker: Use New Photo Picker #24027
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 17 #28011
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Empowering UITests with AI #27929
    do-not-merge, area-testing, area-ai
  • Fixed ScrollView Orientation Neither issue #27231
    community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Add VerifyScreenshot method overrides to verify a specific element #27632
    do-not-merge, area-testing
  • [iOS] RefreshView Loader Appears Frozen When Used with Shell TabBar - fix #27348
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, area-refreshview
  • Fixed the shape rendering issue when the IsVisible property changes #28002
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] - Reenable UITest VerifyInitialEntryReturnTypeChange with Adjustments for Navigation Bar Height Discrepancies on Android #27876
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed improper rendering of ThumbimageSource in Slider #27472
    community ✨, area-controls-slider, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Gradient never returns to the correct color - fix #25910
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Make ShadowTypeConverter public & nullable for .NET 10 #27984
    t/breaking 💥, area-xaml, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Fixed the picker items do not appear when tapping on the picker after navigating through PushModalAsync #28003
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed - Grouped CollectionView items not rendered properly on Android, works on Windows #27847
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Able to cancel WebAuthenticator.AuthenticateAsync programmatically using a CancellationToken #26137 #26180
    area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-webauth, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [iOS] Fix for TableView cells become empty after adding a new cell with context actions #26326
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for CursorPosition Property Not Applied Correctly to Entry Control #27220
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed incorrect tab content display in TabbedPage #27294
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] - Fixed SearchBar Dimension Handling to Respect WidthRequest and HeightRequest Values #27449
    area-testing, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed the SwipeView items were not displayed properly #27399
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed NRE when clearing ListView after navigating back #27274
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed VisualState Setters not working properly for CollectionView [Windows] #27230
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for issues caused by setting Shell.FlyoutWidth on WinUI when binding context values are changed #27151
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [BindingSG] Added Binding.Create support for xaml generated sources #27610
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Fix for FontImageSource color is not applied to the Tab Icon on the TabbedPage #26888
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix for Try scrolling down and when new items are added the first item does not kept in the displayed list. #27153
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed the text and icon color issues in the DatePicker when hovering over it. #27147
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Fix for WebView Fails to Load URLs with Certain Encoded Characters #27003
    community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed user interaction enabled in SearchBar when IsEnabled is false #27009
    community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix the ListView scroll position center and end without animation #27001
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix ListView.ScrollTo to Align SelectedItem with Center or End on Windows #26922
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] White screen when changing the main page - fix #27361
    area-animation, platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • Fixed the CollectionView scroll the content inside Editor when tapping to get focus on it #27851
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Disabled animation for NavigationBar on initial display #27080
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed [Android] ListView scroll position maintains after items refresh #26723
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android & iOS] PopToRootAsync for modal pages - improvements #26851
    community ✨, area-controls-modal, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed the FlyoutPage.Flyout Disappearing When Maximizing the Window on Mac Platform #26701
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Inherit AccessibilityTraits for views wrapped inside a WrapperView #27088
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, t/a11y, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Fix for UI not updating GridItemsLayout when Span becomes 1. #26370
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [UI Test] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #21897
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, area-keyboard
  • Fix iOS] Fix CarouselViewLoopNoFreeze so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #26053
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for TabBar Navigation does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Fixed an issue where an Editor with a small height inside a ScrollView would cause the entire page to scroll #27948
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed Shadow not updated when Clipping a View with a shadow #27873
    platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 15 #27965
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android / Windows] Fixed ListView.HasUnevenRows property run time changes #26882
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] DatePicker | Remove unnecessary UpdateDate() call in UpdateTextColor() #27811
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Android] Fix: Prevent duplicate Completed event when setting ReturnType in Entry #28018
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Fixed ImageButton not honoring Padding value. #26785
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix Disabling some image tests after updating net9.0 with main #25770
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for picker on hidden page opens after back navigation in Android #25319
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [Accessibility] Add Accessibility Traits to CollectionView items on iOS/Catalyst #27971
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Essentials] Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled #27941
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-geolocation, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [iOS] Fixed picker title's color #20205
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fixed ScrollView inside a Grid expands width past device screen when Rotated #27839
    community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
